statements: DELETE FROM performance_reports WHERE department_name = 'Marketing' AND team_name = 'Sales';
DELETE FROM performance_reports WHERE department_name = 'Marketing' AND performance_rating < 3;
DELETE FROM team_performance_reports WHERE team_id = 101 AND performance_score > 90;
DELETE FROM department_performance_reports WHERE department_id = 201 AND performance_score < 70;
DELETE FROM team_performance WHERE department_id = 2 AND performance_score > 8.0;
DELETE FROM performance_reports WHERE employee_id = 123 AND report_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE team_id = 1 AND name LIKE '%Smith%';
DELETE FROM employee_performance WHERE department_id = 2 AND performance_rating < 4;
